text: John Rowlands (1938 - 23 February 2015) "Welsh author John Rowlands dies, 76", BBC News, 23 February 2015 John Rowlands, TheModernNovel.org. Retrieved 23 February 2015 was a Welsh language author of several novels including Lle bo'r gwenyn ("Where Bees May Be", 1960). He was a Professor of Welsh Literature. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Welsh writers
title: John Rowlands (author)
